snippet: Riding in the golf cart he uses because of a rare circulatory condition in his right leg, Casey Martin, was warmly greeted all over the course.
abstract: Casey Martin, using a golf cart to get around the course during the first round of the United States Open because of a rare circulatory condition, finishes with a four-over-par 74; other US Open items noted.
lead_paragraph: Riding in the golf cart he uses because of a rare circulatory condition in his right leg, Casey Martin, was warmly greeted all over the course.

headline.seo: 2012 U.S. Open — Casey Martin Shoots a 74 in His Return to the Olympic Club
headline.main: In Return, Martin Has ‘Good Day’ With a 74
headline.print_headline: In Return, Martin Has ‘Good Day’ With a 74
